channel.title: Monolithon - ERPNext, Frappe, Odoo and more
channel.description: ERPNext, Odoo, eCommerce, Shopify, Static Site Generator, astro.build, Queue Management System, Frappe, n8n, Mautic

item.title: The Monolithon Approach to ERPNext Hungarian Invoicing
item.description: The Monolithon Approach to ERPNext Hungarian Invoicing

item.title: ERPNext GoCardless Module Now Available
item.description: ERPNext GoCardless app arrived!

item.title: Odoo 17.0 release
item.description: The latest version of Odoo, Odoo 17, has been released. Lots of novelties, huge opportunities, and important decisions.

item.title: ERPNext 15.0 release
item.description: The release of ERPNext 15 was indeed preceded by this year's Frappeverse, the ERPNext conference, but largely, it was also about the new version.

item.title: Switch to astro.build SSG (Static Site Generator)
item.description: A monolithon.com still runs on the ERPNext system, but we have separated the public website and now use astro.build for it.

item.title: Odoo and ERPNext together with Frappe
item.description: The Odoo print view editor is not nearly as user-friendly as what Frappe offers for ERPNext, especially the revamped version showcased in the previous post.

item.title: New Print Designing App from Frappe to ERPNext
item.description: Compared to other systems, creating printable or PDF documents with ERPNext has always been easier, but now it's really child's play.

item.title: Frappe Insights from the ERPNext Team
item.description: In a previous blog post about ERPNext, BI, and Business Intelligence+Metabase, I intentionally didn't mention that the Frappe team also has a similar solution, which is why I planned this separate entry.

item.title: How to Use Downloadable Documents in ERPNext Email Templates
item.description: In this example (for Delivery Note), you can use the following code to include a link to download the document in your email template

item.title: New Workflow Builder Arriving in ERPNext
item.description: TÃ¼rker TUNALI, our Turkish colleague, spotted the upcoming new Workflow Builder in the ERPNext GitHub repository.

item.title: Accounting in ERPNext System
item.description: I have been owing an article about accounting in the ERPNext system for a long time, where I have compiled some aspects that may be useful to others as well.

item.title: Chromebook and ERPNext
item.description: I've been planning to write a Chromebook review for a while, and now is the right time because both Chromebook and ERPNext have become excellent choices for both personal and business use.

item.title: VueStoreFront - the Swiss Army Knife of Headless E-commerce - Setting Up a Developer Environment
item.description: I have already showcased the flexibility and feature-richness of ERPNext, but I've also mentioned that it's beneficial to use it alongside other software. One such solution is VueStoreFront, a headless e-commerce platform.

item.title: ERPNext Development and Developer Tools
item.description: There are some important things to know about ERPNext development. ERPNext is easily customizable and extensible, allowing users to tailor the system to their unique business needs.

item.title: ERPNext, BI, and Business Intelligence+Metabase
item.description: We should consider ERPNext as a data warehouse and the central storage unit for all important business data.

item.title: Why is ERPNext Database Growing and What Can We Do About It?
item.description: Typical cloud systems, unlike ERPNext, where providers do not price based on the resources used but on other criteria, also utilize various resources...

item.title: ERPNext Conference 2021 - November 19-20
item.description: The ERPNext conference, which was canceled in 2020 due to COVID, is finally back and will be organized by the ERPNext developers at Frappe.

item.title: ERPNext and the New Shopify eCommerce Integration for Webshops
item.description: The ERPNext's own webshop solution was already available, but now the Shopify integration has reached a new level.

item.title: Hungarian Micro-Enterprise Chart of Accounts
item.description: Since ERPNext's foundation is the chart of accounts, we concluded that it would be beneficial to set up the chart of accounts and default accounts based on the Hungarian localization.

item.title: How are Supplier Invoices Entered into ERPNext?
item.description: There are several ways to do this. One of the simplest is to create a Purchase Invoice from a Purchase Order in the system.

item.title: ERPNext EU VAT Number Verification
item.description: ERPNext Hungarian invoicing has many parts due to the complexity of the topic. When dealing with EU partners, EU VAT number verification is a crucial step.

item.title: ERPNext Hungarian National Tax and Customs Administration (NAV) Online Invoice Preview
item.description: This is how creating customers/suppliers works in ERPNext. We retrieve data from the Hungarian NAV online invoice system based on the VAT number. This forms the foundation of ERPNext Hungarian NAV compliant invoicing.

item.title: Custom Print Formats and Translations in ERPNext
Upgraded monolithon.com to ERPNext 14.0 Version
item.description: The Hungarian ERPNext and Frappe portal is now running on version 14.

item.title: ERPNext Conference 2022 Organized by the Frappe Team
item.description: This year, the ERPNext conference organized by Frappe emphasized in-person presence, and there was no online broadcast. However, they recorded various high-quality presentations, which will be edited and published later. Once they become available, I will share more information. For now, we could get a glimpse of the presentations on Twitter, as the conference program covered various topics

item.title: Indexing the ERPNext Website on Google
item.description: Our website has been indexed by Google so far, as it was not blocked. But there are ways to improve it further.

item.title: Analytical Accounting, Cost Centers, and Profit Centers in ERPNext
New ERPNext Feature Zero Downtime Operations
item.description: For an ERP and business management system, it is critical to be always available and functional when needed. The need for this depends on the peculiarities of the business.

item.title: MNB Exchange Rates in ERPNext System
item.description: The use of ERPNext system in Hungarian and compliance with Hungarian regulations involve various localization tasks. One of these tasks is handling MNB exchange rates. Let's explore the solution!

item.title: ERPNext Google Calendar Synchronization
item.description: Synchronizing ERPNext with Google Calendar has been possible for a long time, but there is still room for improvement. Let me show you how!

item.title: Form Building with ERPNext
item.description: Online and, let's face it, even offline businesses cannot operate without well-formulated questions. There are numerous options available for this purpose.

item.title: ERPNext 14 Release
item.description: I am delighted to announce that the latest version of ERPNext, ERPNext 14, has been released!

item.title: ERPNext Ticketing Solutions
item.description: Where there are customers, there are also customer relationships. And this is an integral part of the complete customer experience, making it essential for both customers and customer support staff to care about how customer support is handled.

item.title: ERPNext Chat Solutions
item.description: Just as ERPNext and IT are in a continuous process of change, the ERPNext chat application has also undergone this evolutionary development.

item.title: Correcting Warehouse Stock and Product Valuation in ERPNext
Closing a Manufacturing Order with Less Quantity Produced in ERPNext
Disposal in the ERPNext system
ERPNext GDPR and Cookie Management
item.description: Monolithon.com, the Hungarian ERPNext portal, also uses cookies, as most internet websites do, and according to EU directives, visitors need to be informed about this.

item.title: ERPNext Hungarian Knowledge Base
item.description: The Hungarian ERPNext knowledge base has been launched. Constantly updated with new content.

item.title: How to fix incorrect product valuation in ERPNext
item.description: During the initial implementation of ERPNext, we entered a purchase order in a foreign currency (at a net price). Later, it turned out that we did not receive the goods, but they are still present in our warehouse. Additionally,

item.title: Importing Master Data into ERPNext
Manufacturing More Products Than Planned in ERPNext
Periodic or Real-Time Inventory Valuation in ERPNext
The First New Feature of ERPNext 14
item.description: You can track on GitHub the new features and improvements that are included in the new versions. Now, the limitation of kanban cards has been removed.

item.title: Inventory Valuation in ERPNext System
Wiki-like Pages Wanted
item.description: The demand for creating wiki-like pages has come up multiple times. While this was already possible, there is now an official solution for it.

item.title: Year-End Task - Managing Exchange Rates in ERPNext
item.description: ERPNext was already capable of managing current exchange rates, but there's a small change in handling the current conversion rates that is worth considering for planning.

item.title: Insight into the Spirit of ERPNext and Frappe
item.description: ERPNext is a business software, but the people behind it work every day to create a new organizational culture that makes ERPNext better and better.

item.title: Data Synchronization Made Easy with ERPNext's Data Import c
item.description: Most ERP implementations aim to minimize the use of Excel and automate manual work. But without a (good) data import feature, there is no ERP.

item.title: Woocommerce Integration with ERPNext
item.description: You might know that ERPNext comes with a built-in Woocommerce integration, which works well, but the devil is in the details.

item.title: ERPNext 13 has been released!
item.description: ERPNext 13 was officially released a few days ago. We didn't sleep on it, as we have been using it for a while now.

item.title: Native Android/iOS App Arriving for ERPNext 13.0
item.description: ERPNext has been doing well in terms of mobile usage on both Android and iOS systems, but now a completely new era begins.

item.title: ERPNext 13.0 Version Gets a New Look
item.description: The ERPNext interface has always been streamlined, but with further simplification, it can now be considered beautiful as well. Of course, beauty is subjective, but everyone can decide for themselves based on the images.

item.title: My first blog post on monolithon.com about ERPNext
item.description: I created this blog post during the installation of ERPNext, so I'm just modifying it to preserve it for posterity.
